excerpt: "Enter The Afterparty, a murder mystery show where every suspect's account is stylized as a different film genre. \"Hannah,\" Season 2 's fourth episode, takes its cues from Anderson's oeuvre, and watching it feels like a breath of fresh air amidst the muddled smog of AI-generated Anderson parodies."
